text: Na tekh, kotoryye prodolzhali poklonyat'sya tel'tsu, kak samarityanin i yego posledovateli, padot gnev Allakha v budushchey zhizni, i ikh postignet bol'shoye unizheniye v blizhayshey zhizni. Podobnoye nakazaniye budet dlya kazhdogo cheloveka, kotoryy izmyshlyayet lozh' na Allakha i poklonyayetsya drugim bozhestvam pomimo Nego
